column3: Latest;Preah Sihanouk:  Airport Police in cooperation with Police of Preah Sihanouk province deported three Chinese nationals
column4: two women and one man at 9.50 am on September 06
column7: was received by the Preah Sihanouk Provincial Police on 27 July 2019 in connection with illegal  drug use. SHADIYA ROUZI
